pli-tv-pvr1.5:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.5:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for having sexual intercourse, through how many of the six kinds of origination of offenses do they originate?
pli-tv-pvr1.5:1.2: When it comes to the offenses for having sexual intercourse, they originate through one of the six kinds of origination of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.5:1.3: from body and mind, not from speech. …
pli-tv-pvr1.5:2.1: When it comes to the offenses for, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, through how many of the six kinds of origination of offenses do they originate?
pli-tv-pvr1.5:2.3: it originates by body and by mind, not by voice.
pli-tv-pvr1.5:3.1: Concluded is the Fifth Chapter: that on Origins
